zh.title: Solana/美元技术分析：[短期震荡，谨慎操作]
zh.content:
当前Solana（SOL/USD）的价格为136.66美元，近期出现了小幅回调，24小时变化为-1.14%。从高点138.28美元和低点136.4美元来看，市场情绪相对谨慎，可能面临短期震荡的局面。投资者需关注市场的进一步动态，以决定下一步的操作。

从技术指标来看，MACD目前为负值-1.060331，显示出短期内卖压较重，而RSI目前数据缺失，无法全面评估超买或超卖状态。这表明市场可能缺乏强烈的买入动力，短期内存在调整的可能性。SMA(20)在139.787美元附近，形成了一个短期阻力位。

支撑位方面，136.4美元是一个关键的支撑区域，如果价格跌破该水平，可能会引发进一步的下行压力。反之，若能有效突破139.787美元的阻力位，则有可能恢复上涨趋势。因此，交易者可考虑在136.4美元附近寻找买入机会，反之在139.787美元附近则可考虑减仓或止盈。

总体来看，建议投资者在当前市场环境中采取谨慎的操作策略，密切关注关键支撑和阻力水平的变化，以便及时调整投资决策。

en.title: Solana vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Solana (SOL) stands at 136.66, reflecting a slight decline of 1.14% over the past 24 hours. This price action suggests a short-term bearish sentiment, particularly as the cryptocurrency has been unable to sustain momentum above the recent high of 138.28. Traders should closely monitor this level, as a break below the recent low of 136.4 could signal further downward pressure, while a move back above 138.28 may indicate a potential recovery.

The absence of an RSI value and the current MACD reading of -1.060331 suggests that momentum is leaning bearish. A negative MACD indicates that the price momentum is weak, and without a clear signal line, the market may remain indecisive. Traders should also consider the SMA(20) at 139.787, which acts as a dynamic resistance level. If SOL can rally above this moving average, it may attract buyers and trigger a short-term reversal.

Support levels can be identified around the recent low of 136.4, which may serve as a critical point for buyers looking to enter the market. Should the price breach this level, further support could be seen at psychological thresholds such as 135.00. Conversely, resistance at 138.28 remains a crucial barrier that, if surpassed, could lead to an upward trajectory, potentially targeting the SMA(50) or higher thresholds.

For traders, a cautious approach is advisable. Consider placing buy orders near the support level of 136.4 while monitoring for any bullish reversal signals. Conversely, selling pressure may be warranted if the price convincingly breaks below this support. Maintaining a watchful eye on volume trends will also be essential, as increased trading activity could provide further insights into market sentiment and potential breakouts or breakdowns.
